name: HTMLString
summary: Escape and unescape HTML entities in Swift
description: `HTMLString` is a fast library written in Swift that enables your app to escape and unescape HTML entities in Strings. It supports both ASCII and Unicode. You can use it with 2125 keyboard (`&`), decimal (`€`) and hexadecimal (`🙃`) entities. It has native support for Swift's Extended Grapheme Clusters. Fully unit tested and documented.
